quest.name: When It Rains
journal: Judging by his countenance, the manager of suites has ill tidings for you.

You learn from the manager of suites that Lakeland is under attack by a host of sin eaters, though he assures you that the Crystarium will remain secure. Nevertheless eager to help, you agree to check on citizens gathered at the Exedra in case any are in need of aid.

The people of the Crystarium seem unaffected by the threat bearing down upon their city─by contrast to the recently returned Alisaie, who rightly finds the presence of sin eaters beneath the reclaimed sky rather unsettling. Any theories as to their provenance will have to wait, however, as Alphinaud arrives to inform you that several anchors around the city must be activated before the protective barrier that serves as its primary defense can take effect. This process is best completed sooner rather than later, so you and Alisaie agree to assist.
After wending your way through the city, you find the first anchor on a bridge above the Rotunda. You pull down on its handle, and the glow it emits indicates that it is now active.

You activate the second anchor, and moments later, a faceted barrier weaves its way up from the array of devices to shield the Crystarium─and rebuffs a full dozen sin eaters in the nick of time. The Leveilleur twins, having arrived to witness the scene with you, indicate that your next destination will be the battlefield in the Lakeland wilds, where Lyna and her people are already engaging the eater host.

You take to the field with Alphinaud and Alisaie, and immediately set to aiding the beleaguered Crystarium troops, cutting down eater after eater as you make your way across Lakeland. Though your group is able to save many, you find yourself witness to death at every turn. You eventually encounter Y'shtola and Urianger, who join you in your rush to the Imperative, as well as Thancred and Minfilia, who split from your party in pursuit of a powerful eater.

You reach the Ostall Imperative to find it beset by eaters, its defenders beleaguered and bleeding. After a pitched battle against manifold foes, you triumph, seizing an advantage that will make it possible for Crystarium forces to reclaim Lakeland and drive back any stragglers.

After the battle is decided at last, you speak with Alisaie. She confirms that procedures for ensuring proper care of the wounded are already well underway. As for the other casualties...the Crystarium will likely long be mourning not only those lost to death, but to the sin eater horde as well.
objectives: Defeat the sin eaters in the wood!
Protect the vulnerable en route to the Round!
Defeat the sin eaters at Radisca's Round!

dialogue.name: GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS
dialogue.text: Ah, I suspected that you might be awake. I could scarce imagine you sleeping through such a commotion.

dialogue.name: GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS
dialogue.text: An entire host of sin eaters appears to be advancing upon the Crystarium. Emergency measures are being taken as we speak.

dialogue.name: GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS
dialogue.text: Rest assured, however, that we are safe so long as we remain under the Crystal Tower's aegis. You may return to your quarters, if you wish.

dialogue.name: GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS
dialogue.text: Yes, I thought you might feel that way. And I cannot say that your assistance would be anything less than welcome.

dialogue.name: GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS
dialogue.text: I must remain here to disseminate information to the other residents, but you are under no such obligation─and thus free to aid any of the townsfolk who may be in distress.

dialogue.name: GUIDEOFTHEPENDANTS
dialogue.text: The Exedra tends to become a point of congregation in times of need, crowded with those seeking solace in companionship. You would have my personal gratitude if you would offer succor to those there.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Few townsfolk are about, and you spy none who appear to be in distress.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Forename!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I've only just returned from Amh Araeng, yet I find the Crystarium moments from being beset by sin eaters!?

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Where are they coming from? This shouldn't be possible─we restored the darkness!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Well, this is a fortunate coincidence.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Brother! Tell me you have some idea why this is happening.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I may─but for the moment we'll need to postpone such discussions in favor of action.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The Crystal Exarch is preparing to deploy a barrier around the Crystarium as we speak. Ensuring that he is able to do so should be our first concern.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: There are a number of instruments placed about the Crystarium that function as anchors for the barrier. I'm on my way to activate them now.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...In which case, three pairs of hands would be better than one? Very well. I'll take the ones to the south.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I shall deal with the northern apparatus, then. Will you handle the western two? They're ensconced on platforms extending from the upper level of the aetheryte plaza.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Despite having very little idea as to how it functions, it appears that you have activated the device successfully.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: If Alphinaud is opting to act first and speak later, I don't doubt the urgency of the situation. Let's go.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We ought to join the vanguard as soon as possible. If the number of eaters we just saw is any indication, we'll be facing a formidable host.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: What lovely weather. Just what we needed.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: It seems the battle has already begun in earnest. Make haste!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Crystarium forces are engaging the sin eaters at various locations across Lakeland.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Assist them in defeating the eaters before they are decimated.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: It is as we feared.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: But our task is as it ever was─turn the tide!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Bear it just a moment longer...

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Thou must needs remain still.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Take a deep breath for me. That's it...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: It seems we've driven them back─for the time being, at least.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: The wounded have been collected and are undergoing treatment now. Once they're ready to be moved, we'll have them carried back to the Crystarium.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: The dead as well, of course. Those whose bodies remain, anyway...

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Sin Eater Momentum

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: Crystarium Forces Remaining

dialogue.name: QIB
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I hear shouting! Come on!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: They need our help!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: More eaters. Don't let your guard down.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Those eaters...they're moving toward Radisca's Round.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We should follow─but we cannot neglect those in need of aid.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: If it's this bad here, I shudder to think what it's like elsewhere...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: A timely arrival, Forename. I have my hands full here.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Mine own magicks shall suffice to aid Y'shtola. I bid thee offer succor to the guard.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: The eater's aether swells. I would hate to find out what it intends to do next.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Defend me─let none interrupt my incantation.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Draw the lesser eaters within the perimeter!

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Master Matoya has a few tricks up her sleeve. Allow me to demonstrate.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: A most impressive trick indeed...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: As if you've none of your own. Let's make for the Imperative, shall we?

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Hesitate not should any eaters cross our path.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Someone hath made short work of these eaters...

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Forename! You'll be glad to know that the locals have all taken shelter.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Nevertheless, we can't allow the eaters to gain any ground. With me!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: That can't be good...

dialogue.name: SOLDIER
dialogue.text: Hold your ground, even if it cost you your life!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Gods damn it all, we're too late...

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: I'll follow the eater. You press on to the Imperative.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: I'm staying with you!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: We've lost too many already. We must hurry.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: These eaters are too organized. They cannot merely be acting on instinct.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The lives of the wounded are in our hands!

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Have care. That is no ordinary eater.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: More eaters...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: They're protecting it, somehow. We shall need to deal with them first.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I feel a swell of aether! Gather around me, quickly!

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Perhaps now is the time to put my research to the test.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: And yet more still come!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Forename, buy me some time. Alphinaud─I'll need aether.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Right. Everyone, channel your aether into Alisaie!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The moment of truth!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I entrust this to you!

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I have faith in you.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: The power of the stars do I bequeath to thee.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: We fight for those who cannot!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Forward!

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I must keep fighting... I must...

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: Of all the times...

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Mine apologies...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: You must carry on...
